message.body:
Hey Pete. Sorry for getting back to you so late, it's been busy. I'm doing all right. I took off from work today cause I had my pupils dilated and it hurts to see.
How are things at over there?
Not bad. I'm going to be doing my masters in the fall in business analytics. I've been playing with Python. How are you doing?

Hooo~ That's cool. Just starting out?
Honestly, work kinda sucks. The commuting sucks and, up until last week, the tech was from 1995 era. Luckily, we upgraded some computers to Win 7, and I got one of them.
I had to set the computers up and got super nostalgic.
I'm sure they're expertly cabled.
We need to figure out our own deal. I think data is the future, but I'm open to suggestions.
What?
Starting our own company. I see big data as the future.
Not for 2 years, but that's my exit plan.
I don't know too much about it, but I think that's something that's been growing a lot.
You know, this is random, but I feel like we're in an app bubble.
Lots of stat and Hadoop. If I can get it off the ground I have no reservations with you kicking ass.
We can support the app bubble and real business.
Have you noticed it? WhatsApp and Uber getting bought for billions.
Uber is over valued, but I love them. What's app was crazy.
They made profit on 1$/year. That's how big of a rip SMS is
Is your current work rewarding?

Thanks for the code. I haven't used Uber, but I'll give it a shot if I'm stuck drunk somewhere one night.
It depends. Some of the stuff I did earlier in was rewarding, but it's been boring lately.
I just got a new project this week that seems to have good potential though
Any better ideas?
Still working on getting clearance...
You're going to have crazy clearance
I don't have any ideas yet. Just sit, learn, and get some experience.
I don't see myself here forever though.
Just ride it through, it'll get better
I saw Office Space for the first time like 2 months ago.
I bet that hit hard
Yeah. I'm glad I watched it after I started working.
I was told I should rewatch Fight Club.
Just be you. You're awesome. When I figure it out, you're hire #1.
Thanks Pete. Will be looking forward to it.
There is too much talent I have access to not make it work.
